bill.title: Relating To The Interisland Transmission System.
bill.description: Repeals chapter 269, part VIII, Hawaii Revised Statutes, relating to the interisland transmission system. (CD1)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to TRE/CPH, WAM.
Re-Referred to CPH/TRE.
The committee(s) on CPH/TRE has scheduled a public hearing on 02-22-17 1:15PM in conference room 225.

The committee(s) on TRE recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in TRE were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Inouye, Dela Cruz, English, Harimoto; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Shimabukuro.
The committee(s) on CPH deferred the measure until 02-23-17 9:45AM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on CPH recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPH were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, S. Chang, Espero, Ihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Nishihara, Kidani, Ruderman.
Reported from CPH/TRE (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 607) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-07-17.
Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none. Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Gabbard). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 138) in amended form (SD 1).
Pass First Reading
Referred to EEP, CPC, referral sheet 27
Bill scheduled to be heard by EEP on Tuesday, 03-21-17 8:30AM in House conference room 325.

The committees on EEP recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) C. Lee, Lowen, Cullen, Evans, Say, Yamane, Fukumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Ichiyama, Kong.
Reported from EEP (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1258) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to CPC.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on CPC with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) LoPresti voting no (1) and Representative(s) Aquino, DeCoite, Har, Ichiyama, C. Lee, Thielen excused (6).
Bill scheduled to be heard by CPC on Thursday, 03-30-17 2:00PM in House conference room 329.
Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

The committees on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) Takumi, Ito, Say, Takayama, Todd; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Ichiyama, Aquino, Yamane, Fukumoto.
Reported from CPC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1558), recommending passage on Third Reading.
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Choy, Har, McKelvey, Oshiro, Say excused (5). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 390).
Deferred One Day 04-05-17.
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 514).
House Conferees Appointed: C. Lee, Takumi Co-Chairs; Quinlan, Say, Tupola.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 587).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Baker Chair; Inouye Co-Chair; S. Chang.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 681).
Conference committee meeting scheduled for 04-24-17 2:55PM in conference room 016.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Inouye, S. Chang; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) C. Lee, Takumi, Quinlan, Say, Tupola; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 16).
48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 05-02-17.
Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 16) as amended in (CD 1).
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 05-02-17.
Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). Ayes, 20; Aye(s) with reservations: none. Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Gabbard). Excused, 4 (Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Galuteria, Green, K. Kahele).
Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) LoPresti voting no (1) and none excused (0).
Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 737).
Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 642).
Enrolled to Governor.
Became law without the Governor's signature, Act 205, 07/12/2017, (Gov. Msg. No. 1319).
Became law without the Governor's signature, Act 205, 07/12/2017, (Gov. Msg. No. 1319).
